text: The 1925 Southern Conference Men's Basketball Tournament took place from February 26–March 3, 1925, at Municipal Auditorium in Atlanta, Georgia. The North Carolina Tar Heels won their third Southern Conference title, led by head coach Monk McDonald.Southern Conference Tournament Results. p. 6.
